message: Welcome to our store! I am excited to offer you this high-quality product. Given its exceptional nature, it is valued at $1200000 by those who appreciate its value. With a success rate of 33.33% for high-quality items, you can trust that you're making an investment in excellence. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own something truly remarkable.

I'm not buying. The product's quality might be high, but the probability of it being high quality is only 33.33%. The expected value of buying the product is $400000 (33.33% of $1200000), which is less than the price of $1000000.

Hello there! I hope you're considering this opportunity carefully. This product, while not guaranteed to be high-quality, offers the chance to acquire something unique. Remember, with a 66.67% chance of it being low-quality, the risk is part of the experience. However, if it turns out to be high-quality, it could be worth much more. Considering the excitement of possibly owning something valuable, would you like to take a chance on this intriguing item?
I won't buy it since the expected value is less than the price
